Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Divine Awareness.name: Divine Awareness
Divine Awareness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows if it hears a lie.

Exalted Restoration.name: Exalted Restoration
Exalted Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Flying Sword]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Slaying Bow]].

Slaying Bow.name: Slaying Bow
Slaying Bow.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] [[lookup @range.units activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]].

Failure: If the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] has 100 Hit Points or fewer, it dies. It otherwise takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Flying Sword.name: Flying Sword
Flying Sword.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Hit or Miss: The sword magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hand or hovers within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] immediately after a ranged attack.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectEvil]{Detect Evil and Good}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommune000]{Commune}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplControlWea]{Control Weather}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplResurrecti]{Resurrection}

Detect Evil and Good.name: Detect Evil and Good
Detect Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, you sense the location of any Aberration, Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead within 30 feet of yourself. You also sense whether the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell is active there and, if so, where.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Commune.name: Commune
Commune.description:
You contact a deity or a divine proxy and ask up to three questions that can be answered with yes or no. You must ask your questions before the spell ends. You receive a correct answer for each question.

Divine beings aren't necessarily omniscient, so you might receive "unclear" as an answer if a question pertains to information that lies beyond the deity's knowledge. In a case where a one-word answer could be misleading or contrary to the deity's interests, the DM might offer a short phrase as an answer instead.

If you cast the spell more than once before finishing a Long Rest, there is a cumulative 25 percent chance for each casting after the first that you get no answer.

Control Weather.name: Control Weather
Control Weather.description:
You take control of the weather within 5 miles of you for the duration. You must be outdoors to cast this spell, and it ends early if you go indoors.

When you cast the spell, you change the current weather conditions, which are determined by the DM. You can change precipitation, temperature, and wind. It takes 1d4 × 10 minutes for the new conditions to take effect. Once they do so, you can change the conditions again. When the spell ends, the weather gradually returns to normal.

When you change the weather conditions, find a current condition on the following tables and change its stage by one, up or down. When changing the wind, you can change its direction.

Precipitation
StageCondition
1Clear
2Light clouds
3Overcast or ground fog
4Rain, hail, or snow
5Torrential rain, driving hail, or blizzard
Temperature
StageCondition
1Heat wave
2Hot
3Warm
4Cool
5Cold
6Freezing
Wind
StageCondition
1Calm
2Moderate wind
3Strong wind
4Gale
5Storm

Dispel Evil and Good.name: Dispel Evil and Good
Dispel Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As a Magic action, you touch a creature that is possessed by or has the &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Frightened] condition from one or more creatures of the types above. The target is no longer possessed, Charmed, or Frightened by such creatures.

Dismissal. As a Magic action, you target one creature you can see within 5 feet of you that has one of the creature types above. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane if it isn't there already. If they aren't on their home plane, Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and Fey are sent to the Feywild.

Dismissal.name: Dismissal
Dismissal.affectsSpecial: Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead

Break Enchantment.name: Break Enchantment
Break Enchantment.affectsSpecial: Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead

Dispelling Evil and Good.name: Dispelling Evil and Good
Dispelling Evil and Good.description: For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions: Break Enchantment or Dismissal.

Resurrection.name: Resurrection
Resurrection.description:
With a touch, you revive a dead creature that has been dead for no more than a century, didn't die of old age, and wasn't Undead when it died.

The creature returns to life with all its Hit Points. This spell also neutralizes any poisons that affected the creature at the time of death. This spell closes all mortal wounds and restores any missing body parts.

Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Casting this spell to revive a creature that has been dead for 365 days or longer taxes you. Until you finish a Long Rest, you can't cast spells again, and you have Disadvantage on D20 Tests.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 1).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 1)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 1).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 2).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 2)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 2).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 3).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 3)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 3).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 4).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 4)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 4).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Spell Taxed.name: Spell Taxed
Spell Taxed.description: Until you finish a Long Rest, you can’t cast spells again, and you have Disadvantage on D20 Tests.

Blinding Gaze.name: Blinding Gaze
Blinding Gaze.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition for 1 minute.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Radiant Teleport.name: Radiant Teleport
Radiant Teleport.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=HtsFBK1PYKjvy9mn]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HtsFBK1PYKjvy9mn]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=HtsFBK1PYKjvy9mn]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at its destination space.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Divine Aid.name: Divine Aid
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} (level 2 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{Remove Curse}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Cure Wounds.name: Cure Wounds
Cure Wounds.description:
A creature you touch regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

Lesser Restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
Lesser Restoration.description: You touch a creature and end one condition on it: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], or &Reference[poisoned].

Remove Curse.name: Remove Curse
Remove Curse.description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end. If the object is a cursed magic item, its curse remains, but the spell breaks its owner's Attunement to the object so it can be removed or discarded.

Specter.name: Specter
Specter.description: 指示物插图由Forgotten Adventures提供。

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. It takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Life Drain.name: Life Drain
Life Drain.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

Sphinx of Lore.name: Sphinx of Lore
Sphinx of Lore.description:
Sphinxes

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.JPdmXY7WGZdIPlJo caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Inscrutable.name: Inscrutable
Inscrutable.description: No magic can observe the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item Claw]] attacks.

Mind-Rending Roar.name: Mind-Rending Roar
Mind-Rending Roar.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Incapacitated.name: Incapacitated
Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLegendLore]{Legend Lore}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLocateObje]{Locate Object}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{Remove Curse}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplTongues000]{Tongues}

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Identify.name: Identify
Identify.description:
You touch an object throughout the spell's casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell's name.

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手 Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩 Prestidigitation
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法 Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Legend Lore.name: Legend Lore
Legend Lore.description:
Name or describe a famous person, place, or object. The spell brings to your mind a brief summary of the significant lore about that famous thing, as described by the DM.

The lore might consist of important details, amusing revelations, or even secret lore that has never been widely known. The more information you already know about the thing, the more precise and detailed the information you receive is. That information is accurate but might be couched in figurative language or poetry, as determined by the DM.

If the famous thing you chose isn't actually famous, you hear sad musical notes played on a trombone, and the spell fails.

Locate Object.name: Locate Object
Locate Object.description:
Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location if that object is within 1,000 feet of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

The spell can locate a specific object known to you if you have seen it up close—within 30 feet—at least once. Alternatively, the spell can locate the nearest object of a particular kind, such as a certain kind of apparel, jewelry, furniture, tool, or weapon.

This spell can't locate an object if any thickness of lead blocks a direct path between you and the object.

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

Remove Curse.name: Remove Curse
Remove Curse.description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end. If the object is a cursed magic item, its curse remains, but the spell breaks its owner's Attunement to the object so it can be removed or discarded.

Tongues.name: Tongues
Tongues.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken or signed language that it hears or sees. Moreover, when the target communicates by speaking or signing, any creature that knows at least one language can understand it if that creature can hear the speech or see the signing.

Arcane Prowl.name: Arcane Prowl
Arcane Prowl.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport up to [[lookup @range.value activity=a3RqyzU0UqzLJif0]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and it makes one [[/item Claw]] attack.

Weight of Years.name: Weight of Years
Weight of Years.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] feet.

Failure: The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level. While the target has any Exhaustion levels, it appears [[/r 3d10]] years older.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Sphinx of Valor.name: Sphinx of Valor
Sphinx of Valor.description:
Sphinxes

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.JPdmXY7WGZdIPlJo caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Inscrutable.name: Inscrutable
Inscrutable.description: No magic can observe the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Claw]] attacks and uses [[/item Roar]].

Roar.name: Roar
Roar.description:
The sphinx emits a magical roar. Whenever it roars, the roar has a different effect, as detailed below (the sequence resets when it takes a Long Rest):

First Roar.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]], each enemy in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]].

Second Roar.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]], it succeeds automatically.

Third Roar.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]] damage only.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for 1 minute.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: The target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectEvil]{Detect Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHeroesFeas]{Heroes' Feast}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplZoneofTrut]{Zone of Truth}

Detect Evil and Good.name: Detect Evil and Good
Detect Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, you sense the location of any Aberration, Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead within 30 feet of yourself. You also sense whether the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell is active there and, if so, where.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法 Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Greater Restoration.name: Greater Restoration
Greater Restoration.description:
你触碰一名生物并魔法性地移除目标身上的下列效应之一：

  • 1 级 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]{力竭}
  • &Reference[Charmed apply=false]{魅惑}或&Reference[Petrified apply=false]{石化}状态
  • 一道诅咒，包括目标因与一件被诅咒魔法物品的同调所陷入的诅咒。
  • 目标某项属性值的减损
  • 目标生命值上限的降低

Heroes' Feast.name: Heroes' Feast
Heroes' Feast.description:
You conjure a feast that appears on a surface in an unoccupied 10-foot Cube next to you. The feast takes 1 hour to consume and disappears at the end of that time, and the beneficial effects don't set in until this hour is over. Up to twelve creatures can partake of the feast.

A creature that partakes gains several benefits, which last for 24 hours. The creature has &Reference[damageResistance]{Resistance} to Poison damage, and it has Immunity to the &Reference[Frightened] and &Reference[Poisoned] conditions. Its Hit Point maximum also increases by 2d10, and it gains the same number of Hit Points.

Consume Feast.name: Consume Feast
Consume Feast.chatFlavor: Hit Point maximum increased by healing amount

Feast's Benefits.name: Feast's Benefits
Feast's Benefits.description: The creature has &Reference[damageResistance]{Resistance} to Poison damage, and it has Immunity to the &Reference[Frightened] and &Reference[Poisoned] conditions. Its Hit Point maximum also increases by 2d10, and it gains the same number of Hit Points.

Zone of Truth.name: Zone of Truth
Zone of Truth.description:
你创造一个抵御谎言的魔法区域，该区域以施法距离内一点为中心，覆盖以该点为中心15尺半径的球状区域。在法术终止前，生物在一回合中首次进入该区域，或在该区域内开始其回合时，必须进行一次魅力豁免。豁免失败者在该区域内不能故意说谎。而你可以知晓每个生物进行的此豁免成功与否。

受影响的生物可以意识到该效果的存在，因此它可以主动回避回答那些通常会以谎言答复的问题。该生物在回答问题时可以闪烁其词、避重就轻，但说的仍然需要是真话。

Cannot Lie.name: Cannot Lie
Cannot Lie.description:
你在该区域内不能故意说谎。而施法者可以知晓每个受术生物的豁免是成功与否。

你可以意识到该效果的存在，因此你可以主动回避回答那些通常会以谎言答复的问题。你在回答问题时可以闪烁其词、避重就轻，但说的仍然需要是真话。

Arcane Prowl.name: Arcane Prowl
Arcane Prowl.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport up to [[lookup @range.value activity=a3RqyzU0UqzLJif0]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and it makes one [[/item Claw]] attack.

Weight of Years.name: Weight of Years
Weight of Years.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] feet.

Failure: The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level. While the target has any Exhaustion levels, it appears [[/r 3d10]] years older.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Sphinx of Wonder.name: Sphinx of Wonder
Sphinx of Wonder.description:
Sphinxes

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.JPdmXY7WGZdIPlJo caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Sphinx of Wonder

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.knvt7pCk5slbRRf0 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Burst of Ingenuity.name: Burst of Ingenuity
Burst of Ingenuity.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name]] or another creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=AyYipNx3cFaXA0LU]] feet makes an ability check or a saving throw. Response: The sphinx adds 2 to the roll.

Spider.name: Spider
Spider.description: 指示物插图由Forgotten Adventures提供。

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Walker.name: Web Walker
Web Walker.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

Spirit Naga.name: Spirit Naga
Spirit Naga.description:
Spirit Naga

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.SYPUI0R76sVilXaV caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Fiendish Restoration.name: Fiendish Restoration
Fiendish Restoration.description: If it dies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] returns to life in [[/r 1d6]] days and regains all its Hit Points. Only a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks, using [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] or [[/item .mmNecroticRay000]] in any combination.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Somatic or Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWaterBreat]{Water Breathing}

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDimensionD]{Dimension Door}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHoldPerson]{Hold Person} (level 3), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt} (level 4)

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手 Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Water Breathing.name: Water Breathing
Water Breathing.description: This spell grants up to ten willing creatures of your choice within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends. Affected creatures also retain their normal mode of respiration.

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想 Detect Thoughts
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Hold Person.name: Hold Person
Hold Person.description:
Choose a Humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] condition for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional Humanoid for each spell slot level above 2.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.description:
A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Sprite.name: Sprite
Sprite.description:
Sprite

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.V6OhuMIts22zPe8X caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Enchanting Bow.name: Enchanting Bow
Enchanting Bow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Heart Sight.name: Heart Sight
Heart Sight.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=NqVrZShDV1L3zBA3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=NqVrZShDV1L3zBA3]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=NqVrZShDV1L3zBA3]] feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see (Celestials, Fiends, and Undead automatically fail the save).

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the target's emotions and alignment.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

FAek73jM5CyQOO60.name: Invisibility FAek73jM5CyQOO60
FAek73jM5CyQOO60.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Spy.name: Spy
Spy.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepHandCrossb]{Hand Crossbow}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbtulThievesToo]{Thieves' Tools}

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Cunning Action.name: Cunning Action
Cunning Action.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Dash apply=false], the &Reference[Disengage apply=false], or &Reference[Hide apply=false] action.

Steam Mephit.name: Steam Mephit
Steam Mephit.description:
Mephits

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.C5AnYUB2Vhu0urqS caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Blurred Form.name: Blurred Form
Blurred Form.description: Attack rolls against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] are made with Disadvantage unless the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Death Burst.name: Death Burst
Death Burst.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Steam Breath.name: Steam Breath
Steam Breath.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target's Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] next turn..

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: Being underwater doesn't grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

Stirge.name: Stirge
Stirge.description:
Stirges

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.XvhPdtq14MUqgYVO caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Proboscis.name: Proboscis
Proboscis.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target. While attached, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't make Proboscis attacks, and the target takes [[/damage average activity=5xwoPMBiaRBqjFav]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. The target or a creature within 5 feet of it can detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] as an action.

Stone Giant.name: Stone Giant
Stone Giant.description: 指示物插图由Forgotten Adventures提供。

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .mmStoneClub00000]] or [[/item .mmBoulder0000000]] in any combination.

Boulder.name: Boulder
Boulder.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

Deflect Missile.name: Deflect Missile
Deflect Missile.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=9T8cNbSBVACrrmRI]].

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] reduces the damage it takes from the attack by [[/healing average]], and if that damage is reduced to 0, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can redirect some of the attack's force.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=x0MjUmnv2OPAbm6y]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=x0MjUmnv2OPAbm6y]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=x0MjUmnv2OPAbm6y]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Reduce Damage.name: Reduce Damage
Reduce Damage.condition: hit by a ranged attack roll and takes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage from it

Stone Golem.name: Stone Golem

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSlow000000]{Slow} spell, requiring no spell components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

rHwlDG85kUcrUFdg.name: Slow rHwlDG85kUcrUFdg
rHwlDG85kUcrUFdg.description:
You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot Cube within range. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.

An affected target's Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs<=25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell's gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Foundry Note

The inline roll above will return 1 if it succeeded or 0 if it failed.

Slowed.name: Slowed
Slowed.description:
An affected target’s Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can’t take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs>25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell’s gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplControlWea]{Control Weather}

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Control Weather.name: Control Weather
Control Weather.description:
You take control of the weather within 5 miles of you for the duration. You must be outdoors to cast this spell, and it ends early if you go indoors.

When you cast the spell, you change the current weather conditions, which are determined by the DM. You can change precipitation, temperature, and wind. It takes 1d4 × 10 minutes for the new conditions to take effect. Once they do so, you can change the conditions again. When the spell ends, the weather gradually returns to normal.

When you change the weather conditions, find a current condition on the following tables and change its stage by one, up or down. When changing the wind, you can change its direction.

Precipitation
StageCondition
1Clear
2Light clouds
3Overcast or ground fog
4Rain, hail, or snow
5Torrential rain, driving hail, or blizzard
Temperature
StageCondition
1Heat wave
2Hot
3Warm
4Cool
5Cold
6Freezing
Wind
StageCondition
1Calm
2Moderate wind
3Strong wind
4Gale
5Storm

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Medium or Small Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except its Fly Speed is available only in its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

Dominate Person.name: Dominate Person
Dominate Person.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. The target has Advantage on the save if you or your allies are fighting it. Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

You have a telepathic link with the Charmed target while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. On your turn, you can use this link to issue commands to the target (no action required), such as "Attack that creature," "Move over there," or "Fetch that object." The target does its best to obey on its turn. If it completes an order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it acts and moves as it likes, focusing on protecting itself.

You can command the target to take a Reaction but must take your own Reaction to do so.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Your Concentration can last longer with a spell slot of level 6 (up to 10 minutes), 7 (up to 1 hour), or 8+ (up to 8 hours).

Dominated.name: Dominated
Dominated.description: Whenever the &Reference[charmed apply=false] target takes damage, it repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Failure: The target is swallowed, and the Grappled condition ends. A swallowed creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions and can't teleport, it has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

Save.name: Save
Save.affectsSpecial: one Large or smaller creature Grappled

Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover.name: Blinded, Restrained, and Total Cover

Each tree uses the Treant stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, it can't speak, and it lacks this action. A tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, the treant dies, or it is more than 120 feet from the treant. The tree then takes root if possible.

Loathsome Limbs.name: Loathsome Limbs
Loathsome Limbs.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends any turn Bloodied and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]l's limbs is severed, falls into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space, and becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmTrollLimb00000]{Troll Limb}. The limb acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect condition in the character sheet's Effects tab to enable each level of Exhaustion. Since the condition can be applied multiple times, the GM must manually manage the level of Exhaustion. There is an active effect available for each level of exhaustion.

Exhaustion 5.description: The creature has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb.

Exhaustion Dead.name: Exhaustion Dead
Exhaustion Dead.description: The creature has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb.

Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

heal.condition: starts its turn with at least 1 Hit Point

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to [[lookup @range.special activity=Y2IncZu5BjB42z7l]] straight toward an enemy it can see.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

heal.condition: starts its turn with at least 1 Hit Point

Troll Spawn.name: Troll Spawn
Troll Spawn.description: The limb uncannily has the same senses as a whole [[lookup @name lowercase]]. If the limb isn't destroyed within 24 hours, roll [[/r 1d12#On a 12, the limb turns into a troll]]{roll 1d12}. On a 12, the limb turns into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmTroll000000000]{Troll}. Otherwise, the limb withers away.

Tyrannosaurus Rex.name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
Tyrannosaurus Rex.description: 指示物插图由Forgotten Adventures提供。

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] attack and one [[/item .mmTail0000000000]] attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]])). While Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=falsse] condition and can't be targeted by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Tail.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC). While Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=falsse] condition.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: The target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Hooves]] attack and one [[/item Radiant Horn]] attack.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectEvil]{Detect Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]{Druidcraft}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCalmEmotio]{Calm Emotions}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplEntangle00]{Entangle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPasswithou]{Pass without Trace}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWordofReca]{Word of Recall}

Detect Evil and Good.name: Detect Evil and Good
Detect Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, you sense the location of any Aberration, Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead within 30 feet of yourself. You also sense whether the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell is active there and, if so, where.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Druidcraft.name: Druidcraft
Druidcraft.description:
Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range.

Weather Sensor. You create a Tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round.

Bloom. You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.

Sensory Effect. You create a harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, spectral dancing fairies, a gentle breeze, the sound of an animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot Cube.

Fire Play. You light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a campfire.

Calm Emotions.name: Calm Emotions
Calm Emotions.description:
Each Humanoid in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point you choose within range must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be affected by one of the following effects (choose for each creature):

  • The creature has Immunity to the Charmed and Frightened conditions until the spell ends. If the creature was already Charmed or Frightened, those conditions are suppressed for the duration.
  • The creature becomes Indifferent about creatures of your choice that it's Hostile toward. This indifference ends if the target takes damage or witnesses its allies taking damage. When the spell ends, the creature's attitude returns to normal.

Calmed.name: Calmed
Calmed.description: The creature has Immunity to the Charmed and Frightened conditions until the spell ends. If the creature was already Charmed or Frightened, those conditions are suppressed for the duration.

Indifference.name: Indifference
Indifference.description: The creature becomes Indifferent about creatures of your choice that it’s Hostile toward. This indifference ends if the target takes damage or witnesses its allies taking damage. When the spell ends, the creature’s attitude returns to normal.

Dispel Evil and Good.name: Dispel Evil and Good
Dispel Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As a Magic action, you touch a creature that is possessed by or has the &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Frightened] condition from one or more creatures of the types above. The target is no longer possessed, Charmed, or Frightened by such creatures.

Dismissal. As a Magic action, you target one creature you can see within 5 feet of you that has one of the creature types above. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane if it isn't there already. If they aren't on their home plane, Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and Fey are sent to the Feywild.

Dismissal.name: Dismissal
Dismissal.affectsSpecial: Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead

Break Enchantment.name: Break Enchantment
Break Enchantment.affectsSpecial: Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead

Dispelling Evil and Good.name: Dispelling Evil and Good
Dispelling Evil and Good.description: For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions: Break Enchantment or Dismissal.

Entangle.name: 纠缠术 Entangle
Entangle.description:
缠绕的植物在施法距离内从 20 尺方状区域地面中破土而出。在法术持续时间内，这片被植物覆盖的区域变为&Reference[difficultterrain]{困难地形}。法术结束时，这些植物会消失。

在你施展法术时，该区域内的生物（除你之外）必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则陷入&Reference[restrained]{束缚}状态，直到法术终止。一名因此被束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定对抗该法术的豁免 DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 陷入束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定对抗该法术的豁免DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Pass without Trace.name: Pass without Trace
Pass without Trace.description: 你在法术持续时间于 30 尺光环范围内散发出遮蔽灵光。位于灵光范围期间，你和每名你选择的生物在敏捷（[[/check ability=dex skill=ste]]{隐匿}）检定上获得 +10 加值，且不会留下任何踪迹。

Concealed.name: Concealed
Concealed.description: 你和每名被施法者选择的生物在[[/check ability=dex skill=ste]]检定上获得 +10 加值，且不会留下任何踪迹。

Word of Recall.name: Word of Recall
Word of Recall.description:
You and up to five willing creatures within 5 feet of you instantly teleport to a previously designated sanctuary. You and any creatures that teleport with you appear in the nearest unoccupied space to the spot you designated when you prepared your sanctuary (see below). If you cast this spell without first preparing a sanctuary, the spell has no effect.

You must designate a location, such as a temple, as a sanctuary by casting this spell there.

Charging Horn.name: Charging Horn
Charging Horn.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks], and it makes one [[/item Radiant Horn]] attack.

Shimmering Shield.name: Shimmering Shield
Shimmering Shield.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets itself or one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] feet of itself. The target gains [[/healing average temp]], and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s' next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Shielded.name: Shielded
Shielded.description: The target's AC increases by 2 until the end of the bestower's next turn.

Unicorn's Blessing.name: Unicorn's Blessing
Unicorn's Blessing.description: The [[lookup @name]] touches another creature with its horn and casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration} on that creature, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Cure Wounds.name: Cure Wounds
Cure Wounds.description:
A creature you touch regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

Lesser Restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
Lesser Restoration.description: You touch a creature and end one condition on it: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], or &Reference[poisoned].

Vampire.name: Vampire
Vampire.description:
Vampires

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.y4ooBM6PNZfWH3Tv caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Misty Escape.name: Misty Escape
Misty Escape.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can't use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can't return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack (Vampire Form Only).name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
Multiattack (Vampire Form Only).description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmGraveStrike000]]{Grave Strike} attacks and uses [[/item .mmBite0000000000]]{Bite}.

Grave Strike (Vampire Form Only).name: Grave Strike (Vampire Form Only)
Grave Strike (Vampire Form Only).description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two hands.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC) from one of two hands.

Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only).name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only).description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]] feet [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount. A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage and then buried rises the following sunset as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmVampireSpawn00]{Vampire Spawn} under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s control.

save.affectsSpecial: that is willing or that has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCharmPerso], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]), and the duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=fcRXSTOlFJShCl52]] hours. The &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target is a willing recipient of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item .mmBite0000000000]]{Bite}, the damage of which doesn't end the spell. When the spell ends, the target is unaware it was Charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Charm Person.name: Charm Person
Charm Person.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. It does so with Advantage if you or your allies are fighting it. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn't in sunlight or running water, it shape-shifts into a Tiny @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmBat00000000000]{bat} (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 30 ft.) or a Medium cloud of mist (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 20 ft. [hover]), or it returns to its vampire form. Anything it is wearing transforms with it.

While in bat form, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't speak. Its game statistics, other than its size and Speed, are unchanged.

While in mist form, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless and can enter an enemy's space and stop there. If air can pass through a space, the mist can do so, but it can't pass through liquid. It has Resistance to all damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

Beguile.name: Beguile
Beguile.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Command.name: Command
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你 5 尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Deathless Strike.name: Deathless Strike
Deathless Strike.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item .mmGraveStrike000]]{Grave Strike} attack.

Vampire Weakness.name: Vampire Weakness
Vampire Weakness.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has these weaknesses:

Forbiddance. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.

Running Water. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Sunlight. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Disadv. Attacks & Checks.name: Disadv. Attacks & Checks
Disadv. Attacks & Checks.description: While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Vampire Familiar.name: Vampire Familiar
Vampire Familiar.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers (10)}

Vampires

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.y4ooBM6PNZfWH3Tv caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Vampiric Connection.name: Vampiric Connection
Vampiric Connection.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its vampire master are on the same plane of existence, the vampire can communicate with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] telepathically, and the vampire can perceive through the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s senses.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmUmbralDagger00]] attacks.

Umbral Dagger.name: Umbral Dagger
Umbral Dagger.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack, the target becomes Stable but has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. While it has the Poisoned condition, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Poisoned & Paralyzed.name: Poisoned & Paralyzed
Poisoned & Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. While the target has the Poisoned condition, the target also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Deathless Agility.name: Deathless Agility
Deathless Agility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Dash] or &Reference[Disengage] action.

Demonic Restoration.name: Demonic Restoration
Demonic Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. While Poisoned, the target takes [[/damage average activity=ukZveNVmvvtwbDj0]] at the start of each of its turns. Emptying a flask of Holy Water on the target ends the effect early.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (demons succeed automatically).

Whelm.name: Whelm
Whelm.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, is &Reference[suffocating]{suffocating} unless it can breathe water, and takes [[/damage average activity=khxVwH3AB0sx1qRG]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at a time with Whelm.

As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature out of it by succeeding on a [[/check ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]].

Success: Half damage only.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating} unless it can breathe water, and takes damage (see source for damage) at the start of each of the attacking creature's turns.

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's speed in bear form. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

Undead Fortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
Undead Fortitude.description: If damage reduces the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

Initial Save.condition: a creature you can see enters the spirit’s space or starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit

Restrained.description: At the start of each of its turns, the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] target repeats the [[/save ability=dex]] save. On a failed save, the target takes 4d8 (plus 2d8 for each spell slot level above 5) damage of the spirit’s type. On a successful save, the target isn’t Restrained by the spirit.

Pack Damage.name: Pack Damage
Pack Damage.description: Whenever the pack moves within 10 feet of a creature you can see and whenever a creature you can see enters a space within 10 feet of the pack or ends its turn there, you can force that creature to make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d10 Slashing damage. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

save.condition: visible creature moves or ends its turn within 10 feet of the pack

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: Force damage equal to 2d12 + 3 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: Force damage equal to 2d6 + 3 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

Slam.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: Force damage equal to 1d4 + 3.

Shared Resistances.name: Shared Resistances
Shared Resistances.description:
When you summon the spirit, choose one of its Resistances. You have &Reference[damageresistance]{Resistance} to the chosen damage type until the spell ends.

Foundry Note

Active effects and activities applying those effects on this item are provided for optional application of the chosen resistance.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description:
The spirit makes a number of [[/item Rend]] attacks equal to half the spell's level (round down), and it uses [[/item Breath Weapon]].

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{Number of attacks}

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: Melee Attack: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 10 feet. Hit: 1d6 + 4 + the spell's level Piercing damage.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: 2d6 damage of a type this spirit has Resistance to (your choice when you cast the spell). Success: Half damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: At the start of each of your turns, the hound attempts to bite one enemy within 5 feet of it. That enemy must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 4d8 Force damage.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The insect can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description:
The insect makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{Number of attacks}

Poison Jab.name: Poison Jab
Poison Jab.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 10 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 3 plus the spell's level Piercing damage plus 1d4 Poison damage.

Web Bolt.name: Web Bolt
Web Bolt.description: Ranged Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, range 60 ft. Hit: 1d10 + 3 plus the spell's level Bludgeoning damage, and the target's Speed is reduced to 0 until the start of the insect's next turn.

Webbed.name: Webbed
Webbed.description: The target’s Speed is reduced to 0 until the start of the insect’s next turn.

Venomous Spew.name: Venomous Spew
Venomous Spew.description: Constitution Saving Throw: Your spell save DC, one creature the insect can see within 10 feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the insect's next turn.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the insect’s next turn.

Life Bond.name: Life Bond
Life Bond.description: When you regain Hit Points from a level 1+ spell, the steed regains the same number of Hit Points if you're within 5 feet of it.
Life Bond.requirements: you regain Hit Points from a spell

Otherworldly Slam.name: Otherworldly Slam
Otherworldly Slam.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 plus the spell's level of Radiant (Celestial), Psychic (Fey), or Necrotic (Fiend) damage.

Fell Glare.name: Fell Glare
Fell Glare.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, one creature within 60 feet the steed can see. Failure: The target has the &Reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the end of your next turn.

Fey Step.name: Fey Step
Fey Step.description: The steed teleports, along with its rider, to an unoccupied space of your choice up to 60 feet away from itself.

Healing Touch.name: Healing Touch
Healing Touch.description: One creature within 5 feet of the steed regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus the spell's level.

Life Bond.name: Life Bond
