Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: Force damage equal to 1d4 + 3.

Move.name: Move
Move.description: As a Bonus Action, you can move the eye up to 30 feet in any direction. A solid barrier blocks the eye's movement, but the eye can pass through an opening as small as 1 inch in diameter.

Clenched Fist.name: 金刚拳 Clenched Fist
Clenched Fist.description: 这只手对自身周围 5 尺范围内的目标发动一次打击。进行一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则该目标受到 5d8 力场伤害。

Forceful Hand.name: 飞击掌 Forceful Hand
Forceful Hand.description: 这只手尝试推撞自身周围 5 尺范围内的一个体型不超过巨型的生物。目标必须进行一次力量豁免，若失败，这只手会将目标推动至多 5 + 你施法属性调整值的五倍尺。巨手将随着目标一起移动，保持自己处在目标周围 5 尺的范围内。

Grasping Hand.name: 擒拿掌 Grasping Hand
Grasping Hand.description:
这只手尝试对自身周围 5 尺范围内的一个体型不超过巨型的生物进行擒抱。目标必须进行一次敏捷豁免，若失败，则目标陷入 &Reference[Grappled] 状态，逃脱DC等于你的法术豁免DC。在这只手擒抱目标期间，你可以使用一个附赠动作命令这只手对其进行挤压，此时目标将受到 4d6 + 你的施法属性调整值点钝击伤害。

逃离擒抱检定

[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=8+@prof+@flags.dnd5e.summon.mod]]{力量 (运动)} [[/check ability=dex skill=acr dc=8+@prof+@flags.dnd5e.summon.mod]]{敏捷 (体操)}

Crush.name: 碾压
Crush.condition: 毕格比之手擒抱目标期间

Interposing Hand.name: 护身掌 Interposing Hand
Interposing Hand.description: 这只手会在你对抗以其所处空间为源点发出攻击或其他效应时，以及需要穿过其所处空间的攻击以及其他效应时给予你 &Reference[HalfCover] 。此外，这只手所处空间对你的敌人来说视作&Reference[DifficultTerrain] 。

Interposed.name: 阻挡
Interposed.description: 需要穿过其所处空间的攻击以及其他效应时给予你 &Reference[HalfCover] 。

Initial Save.name: Initial Save
Initial Save.condition: a creature you can see enters the spirit’s space or starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit

Save while Restrained.name: Save while Restrained
Save while Restrained.condition: a creature you can see enters the spirit’s space or starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: At the start of each of its turns, the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] target repeats the [[/save ability=dex]] save. On a failed save, the target takes 4d8 (plus 2d8 for each spell slot level above 5) damage of the spirit’s type. On a successful save, the target isn’t Restrained by the spirit.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of your next turn, with both you and the spirit as the source of the fear.

Flames.name: Flames
Flames.description: You create a 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire in an unoccupied space on the ground within range. It lasts for the duration. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the sphere makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

save.condition: Any creature ends its turn within range

Roll.name: Roll
Roll.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can move the sphere up to 30 feet, rolling it along the ground. If you move the sphere into a creature's space, that creature makes the save against the sphere, and the sphere stops moving for the turn.

When you move the sphere, you can direct it over barriers up to 5 feet tall and jump it across pits up to 10 feet wide. Flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried start burning if touched by the sphere.

Carry Weight Adjustment.name: Carry Weight Adjustment
Carry Weight Adjustment.description:
Foundry Note

This item serves to offset the disk's computed carry weight capacity from 510 lbs. to 500 lbs. in accordance with the spell's description.

Vine Attack.name: Vine Attack
Vine Attack.description:
Make a melee spell attack against a creature within 30 feet of the vine. On a hit, the target takes 4d8 Bludgeoning damage and is pulled up to 30 feet toward the vine; if the target is Huge or smaller, it has the &Reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC equal to your spell save DC).

The vine can grapple [[@flags.dnd5e.summon.level - 3]] creature(s) at a time, and you can cause the vine to release a Grappled creature (no action required).

Escape Tests

[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=8+@prof+@flags.dnd5e.summon.mod]]

[[/check ability=dex skill=acr dc=8+@prof+@flags.dnd5e.summon.mod]]

Guarded Area.name: Guarded Area
Guarded Area.description:
Any enemy that moves to a space within 10 feet of the guardian for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 20 Radiant damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The guardian vanishes when it has dealt a total of 60 damage.

Foundry Note

This feature's Limited Uses is optionally provided for tracking the total damage dealt by the guardian. Additionally, The Consume Damage Pool activity is configured with scaling uses consumption in increments of 5 damage for use after the final damage is determined and applied.

Move and Attack.name: Move and Attack
Move and Attack.description: On your later turns, you can take a Bonus Action to move the sword up to 30 feet to a spot you can see and repeat the attack against the same target or a different one. On a hit, the target takes Force damage equal to 4d12 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Move and Attack.name: Move and Attack
Move and Attack.description:
As a Bonus Action on your later turns, you can move the force up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes Force damage equal to 1d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for every slot level above 2.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: Force damage equal to 1d4 + 3.
